name: Press 2 Print
description:
This is an entry for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 5. 

The  invention of the movable type printing press (in Europe, it was long known in Asia.)  by Gutenberg was a milestone that would not only change the political landscape of Germany, but of whole Europe. 

Your goal is to the transcribe the handwritten notes provided into a movable type to print them. Is more addicting than it sounds.
